tuv.seg: Praksismulighet hos Walt Disney Animation Studios
Oza oahpahallin Walt Disney Animation Studios

Sametingene i Norge, Finland og Sverige, og Samerådet offentliggjør i dag en ny mulighet for samiske unge kunst-, animasjon, og/eller filmstudenter eller nyetablerte til å søke seg til en praksisplass hos Walt Disney Animation Studio sommeren 2021, i et tolvukers program.
Leat go gazzame oahpu dahje aitto gárven oahpu dáidda, animašuvnna, gráfalaš dahje filbma suorggis? Walt Disney Animation Studios bovdejit sámi oahpahalli geassái 2021.
Praktikanten fra det samiske området kan søke om et reisetilskudd på 10.000 $, finansiert av sametingene og Samerådet.
Taleanta ovdánahttin oahpahallin oaččut erenomáš vejolašvuođa bargat ovttas Disney bagadeddjiin ja guorahallat buot beliid dáidda, muitalushábmen ja filbmasuorggis.
– Vi er glade for at denne unike muligheten byr seg i 2021, enten digitalt eller stedlig hos Walt Disney Animation Studios i Los Angeles.
Walt Disney Animation Studios Summer Internship Program bistá 12 vahko ja lea máksojuvvon prográmma heivehuvvon sidjiide geat lohket dáidaga, animašuvnna, dihtorgrafihka ja filmma.
Det kom inn mange gode søknader fra Sápmi i fjor, men på grunn av Covid-19 ble praksisordningen i 2020 utsatt.
Fuomáš: sihkarvuohta ja dearvvašvuohta lea hui dehálaš midjiide.
Vi håper derfor at de som hadde søkt i fjor, vurderer å søke igjen.
Eiseváldiid rávvagiid mielde mearriduvvo čađahuvvo go prográmma gáiddusin vuoi Burbank CA studios.

Vi er glade for å kunne bidra til en svært spennende utvekslingsmulighet, sier Aili Keskitalo (sametingspresident i Norge), Tuomas Aslak Juuso (sametingspresident i Finland), Per-Olof Nutti (sametingspresident i Sverige) og Åsa Larsson-Blind (visepresident i Samerådet) i en felles uttalelse.
Loga eambbo sin oahpahalli prográmma ja eavttuid birra dás: Story
Fristen for å søke på praksisplass og reisetilskudd er 24. januar 2021.
CG Artist - Character
Engelsk tekst:
CG Artist - Environment
APPLY AS AN INTERN AT WALT DISNEY ANIMATION STUDIOS
Visual Development
Are you a current or recent student studying art, animation, computer graphics, and film?
Production Management
Walt Disney Animation Studios are inviting students from Sápmi to apply as an intern for the Walt Disney Animation Studios Summer Internship Program 2021.
CG Animation
As a Talent Development intern, you will have the unique opportunity to work directly with a Disney mentor as you explore all aspects of art, storytelling, and filmmaking.
Ohcanáigemearri WDAS oahpahallin: 24.01.2021, dii 11:59 Pacific Standard Time (Fuomaš áigeerohusa).
Walt Disney Animation Studios Summer Internship Program is a 12 week program paid experience designed for students studying art, animation, computer graphics, and film.
Mátkestipeanda

Please note, the safety and well-being of our teams is very important to us. We will be determining whether this program will be in-person at our Burbank, CA studio or virtual in the coming months based on government recommendations.
Oahpahalli galgá ohcat 10.000 $ sturrosaš mátkestipeandda, man Sámiráđđi ja Sámedikkit almmuhit dán oktavuođas.
Read more about their internship program and requirements here: Story

Ohccis galgá leat sámi duogáš, galgá deavdit WDAS eavttuid oahpahallái ja sus galgá leat plána das mo son áigu máhcahit gelbbolašvuođa ruovttoluotta sámi servodahkii, nu go omd. sosiála mediaid bokte, logaldallamiid bokte jnv. Čális ohcama, eanemusat 1 siiddu, gos čilget man vuođul ozat oahpahallin ja mo áiggut čoavdit eavttuid mátkestipendii.
CG Artist - Character
Sádde ohcama dán čujuhussii ja merke ohcama “WDAS oahpahalli”: kmr@saamicouncil.net .
CG Artist - Environment
Ohcanáigemearri mátkestipeanda: 24.01.2021, dii 11:59 Pacific Standard Time (Fuomáš áigeerohusa).
Visual Development
– Mii leat nu ilus go dát erenoamáš vejolašvuohta fas ráhpasa 2021:as, šattaš go digitála hámis dahje báikkálaččat Walt Disney Animation Studioas, Los Angeles:as.
Production Management
Diibmá ledje hui ollu buori ohccit sámis, muhto Covid-19 bissehii oahpahalliortnega dán jagi.
CG Animation
Mii sávvat ahte sii geat ledje dalle ohcan, oidnet liibba fas ohcat dása.
The deadline for applications is 1/24/2021, 11:59 PM PST.

Mii leat ilus go mii sáhttit leat doarjjan duohtandahkat erenoamáš ja ávkkálaš oahpolonohallama, dadjet Aili Keskitalo (sámediggepresideanta Norgga bealde, Tuomas Aslak Juuso (sámediggepresideanta Suoma bealde), Per-Olof Nutti (sámediggepresideanta Ruoŧa bealde) ja Åsa Larsson-Blind (várrepresideanta Sámeráđis) oktasaš cealkámušas.
Travel grant
Oktavuo đadieđut
The internship form Sámi areas can apply for a10. 000$ travel grant, funded by The Saami Council and the Sámi parliaments.
Aili Keskitalo, Telefuvdna: +47 97129305 E-poasta: aili.keskitalo@samediggi.no

The applicant must have Sámi background, meets Disney's requirements for internships and should have a plan for how to bring the knowledge back to the Sami community, such as through social media, lectures etc. Write an application, max 1 page, explaining your applicant basis and how to meet our travel grant requirements.
Tuomas Aslak Juuso Telefuvdna: +358 406873394 E-poasta: tuomas.juuso@samediggi.fi
Send your application for travel grant marked with "WDAS internship” to: kmr@saamicouncil.net
Per-Olof Nutti Telefuvdna: +46 703763112 E-poasta: Per-Olof.Nutti@sametinget.se
The deadline for travel applications is 1/24/2021, 11:59 PM PST.
Åsa Larsson-Blind, Telefuvdna: +46 702543356 E-poasta: asa@saamicouncil.net
– We are pleased that this unique opportunity will present itself in 2021, either digitally or locally at Walt Disney Animation Studios in Los Angeles.
Praktihkalaš dieđut ortnega birra:
Many good applications were received from Sápmi last year, but due to Covid-19, the internship scheme in 2020 was postponed.
Christina Hætta, Sámiráđđi +47 48021734 christina@saamicouncil.net
